de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes

类 Font

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes.AbstractAttribute
      • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes.Font

  • public class Font
extends AbstractAttribute

    The font attribute class can define an align, a text decoration, a font family, a rotation, a font size, a font style, and a font weight. It is used by annotations.

    作者:
    Adrian Lange

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Font.Align
      Enumeration to set the text alignment
      static class  Font.Decoration
      Enumeration to set the font decoration

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Font.Align DEFAULT_ALIGN
      Default align
      static Font.Decoration DEFAULT_DECORATION
      Default text decoration
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_FAMILY
      Default font family as CSS2 font family string
      static double DEFAULT_ROTATION
      Default text rotation as CSS2 text rotation value
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_SIZE
      Default font size as CSS2 font size string
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_STYLE
      Default font style as CSS2 font style string
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_WEIGHT
      Default font weight as CSS2 font weight string

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Font()
      Creates new font attribute with default values.
      Font(Font.Align align, Font.Decoration decoration, java.lang.String family, double rotation, java.lang.String size, java.lang.String style, java.lang.String weight)
      Creates new font attribute with the specified values.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Font.Align getAlign()
      Returns the align or null if it should be ignored.
      Font.Decoration getDecoration()
      Returns the decoration or null if it should be ignored.
      java.lang.String getFamily()
      Returns the font family or null if it should be ignored.
      double getRotation()
      Returns the rotation value or 0.0 if it should be ignored.
      java.lang.String getSize()
      Returns the size string or null if it should be ignored.
      java.lang.String getStyle()
      Returns the style string or null if it should be ignored.
      java.lang.String getWeight()
      Returns the font weight string or null if it should be ignored.
      boolean hasContent()
      Returns true if at least one of the attribute's values is not null.
      void setAlign(Font.Align align)
      Sets the text align.
      void setDecoration(Font.Decoration decoration)
      Sets the font decoration.
      void setFamily(java.lang.String family)
      Sets the font family as CSS2 font family string.
      void setRotation(double rotation)
      Sets the rotation value.
      void setSize(java.lang.String size)
      Sets the font size as CSS2 font size string.
      void setStyle(java.lang.String style)
      Sets the text style as CSS2 text style string.
      void setWeight(java.lang.String weight)
      Sets the font weight as CSS2 font weight string.
      java.lang.String toString()

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Font

        public Font()
        Creates new font attribute with default values.

      • Font

        public Font(Font.Align align,
            Font.Decoration decoration,
            java.lang.String family,
            double rotation,
            java.lang.String size,
            java.lang.String style,
            java.lang.String weight)
        Creates new font attribute with the specified values.
        参数:
        align - Align or null
        decoration - Text decoration or null
        family - Font family as CSS2 font family string
        rotation - Text rotation with 0.0 as default value
        size - Font size as CSS2 font size string or null
        style - Font style as CSS2 font style string or null
        weight - Font weight as CSS2 font weight string or null

      • setAlign

        public void setAlign(Font.Align align)
        Sets the text align. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        align - the align to set

      • setDecoration

        public void setDecoration(Font.Decoration decoration)
        Sets the font decoration. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        decoration - the decoration to set

      • setFamily

        public void setFamily(java.lang.String family)
        Sets the font family as CSS2 font family string. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        family - the family to set

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(double rotation)
        Sets the rotation value. Gets ignored if it has the value 0.0.
        参数:
        rotation - the rotation to set

      • setSize

        public void setSize(java.lang.String size)
        Sets the font size as CSS2 font size string. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        size - the size to set

      • setStyle

        public void setStyle(java.lang.String style)
        Sets the text style as CSS2 text style string. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        style - the style to set

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(java.lang.String weight)
        Sets the font weight as CSS2 font weight string. Gets ignored if it has the value null.
        参数:
        weight - the weight to set
